archimate:Product.name: Architecture landscape
archimate:Product.documentation:
1. Strategic Architecture (er "bred" men med lite "dybde") - a long term summary view of the entire enterprise - allow for direction setting at an executive level
2. Segment Architecture (dekker "del arkitektur" innenfor et bestemt omrÃ¥de) - provide more detailed operating models for areas within an enterprise - used at the program or portifolio level to organize and operationally align more detailed change activity
3. Capability Architecture (produserer et konkret resultat innenfor et segment) - show in a more detail how the enterprise support a particular capability - use to provide an overview of current capability, target capability, and capability ...
